originalText.text:
The team member from Manhattan Cleaning Solution whom recently cleaned my house deserves my deepest appreciation for the outstanding cleaning she performed at my home.

I am telling all my friends, neighbors and coworkers about this company. Best experience I had with a cleaning service in several years!!!

THANK YOU THANK YOU!!!

text.text:
The team member from Manhattan Cleaning Solution whom recently cleaned my house deserves my deepest appreciation for the outstanding cleaning she performed at my home.

I am telling all my friends, neighbors and coworkers about this company. Best experience I had with a cleaning service in several years!!!

THANK YOU THANK YOU!!!

originalText.text: Manhattan Cleaning Services was fantastic.  I needed a cleaning company for an apartment that had over >3 years of dirt buildup along with other issues that other companies said no to.  I called MCS and told them what needed to be done ... They accepted the challenge and conquered.  They made it all happen in the short timeframe needed.  Their workers are cordial, professional, and diligent.  Worth every penny and they proved why they have a 5 star rating. So grateful to Sheridan and MCS!

text.text: Manhattan Cleaning Services was fantastic.  I needed a cleaning company for an apartment that had over >3 years of dirt buildup along with other issues that other companies said no to.  I called MCS and told them what needed to be done ... They accepted the challenge and conquered.  They made it all happen in the short timeframe needed.  Their workers are cordial, professional, and diligent.  Worth every penny and they proved why they have a 5 star rating. So grateful to Sheridan and MCS!

originalText.text:
I love Manhattan cleaning solutions. Destiny has been an Angel to me. Any special requests, she always goes above and Beyond! I just sold my home and she even helped me to organize for my move out!
She has a great spirit and leaves your home clean and with positive energy.
Sheridan the manager always calls to make sure I’m happy with the service.
As a Real Estate Broker, I highly recommend them.  This will be my life long cleaning service. They do commercial and residential. Excellent!

originalText.text: Ms. Yvette came and did an excellent service at my studio. After months of a busy life, things got a little unorganized. She came and organized, cleaned everything neatly and transformed my life. I feel so uncluttered now. Very pleased with her service.
